channel.description: Shell Scripting Review Questions Q. What are the two types of logical constructs mentioned in this chapter? A. The if and case constructs. Q. What would != imply in a looping condition? A. != would check the value for non-equality. Q. What is the function of the shift command? A. The shift command moves an argument to the left. Q. You can script the startup and shutdown of a database. True or False? A. True.
